English: (The general ward is on the 12th floor...)
Well, I'd better get back to work...
German:
Ich sollte mich lieber wieder an die Arbeit
machen ...

English:
Excuse me, you haven't seen the man people call
the manager around here, have you? I'd like to
talk to him.
Chinese:
打擾了。這裡是不是有位叫行政主任的男人？
我希望能見他。
Korean:
실례. 이곳에 사무장이라는 남자는 없는 것인가.
만나게 해주었으면 하는데
German:
Entschuldigung, du hast nicht den Mann gesehen,
der hier der Leiter ist, oder? Ich möchte ihn
sprechen.

English: Oh? Are you with that specialist?
Chinese: 唉啊？你是剛才那位專家先生的朋友嗎？
Korean: 어라? 당신, 아까 그 전문가분이랑 아는 사이야?
German: Ach? Gehörst du zu dem Spezialisten?

English: That's right. Please tell me where the manager is.
Chinese: ……啊，沒錯。我想知道行政主任在哪裡。
Korean: ……그래, 맞아. 사무장이 있는 곳을 알려줬으면 한다
German: Genau. Bitte sag mir, wo der Leiter ist.
